page.title: 03A stream
page.content: The source of the stream is between Old Acre and East Dundry Road. Within our area the stream starts at old bridge and follows the path at the bottom of Water Lane. It then carries on through the lane until it branches under Callington Road and alongside {West Town Lane School. } In some parts of the stream there is wild life. We found Shrimps, a Worm Leech, a Water Louse and we have seen Sticklebacks. When the Robertsons jam factory was in existence the stream was polluted. It is now less polluted but thick with weed.
